```{sql}
SELECT n.name, mi.movie_id, n.gender, ci.role_id, mi.info
FROM cast_info AS  ci
INNER JOIN name AS n ON n.id = ci.person_id 
INNER JOIN movie_info AS mi ON mi.movie_id = ci.movie_id
WHERE ci.role_id = 8
AND mi.info_type_id = 3
GROUP BY ci.person_id
LIMIT 20; 
```
